hero.title: Train.
hero.subtitle: Premium calisthenics equipment. Built for those who never stop.

about.title: About us
about.subtitle: Static is built for people who train seriously, with essential and durable gear, no compromises.

vision.heading: Vision
vision.text: We build calisthenics products designed to last: minimal design, reliable materials, and real-world performance in every session.

quality.heading: Quality
quality.text: Each line is developed with practical testing and attention to detail, delivering stability, grip, and safety during training.

community.heading: Community
community.text: Static is also a community: athletes, coaches, and enthusiasts sharing the same mindset, pushing limits every day.

intro.title:
Every detail
matters.
intro.subtitle: Scroll to discover what makes Static unique.

cta.title:
Ready to
push further?
cta.subtitle: Discover the full Static line. Equipment made for those who won't settle.

1.label: 01 — Materials
1.title:
Carbon steel.
Forged to last.
1.text: Every Pull-Up Static bar is made from heat-treated carbon steel with a 180°C powder anti-corrosion coating. A surface that resists sweat, humidity and everyday wear for years.
1.detail: Thickness 32 mm · Weight 4.2 kg · Rated load 300 kg

2.label: 02 — Installation
2.title:
Mounting in
4 minutes flat.
2.text: The modular frame adapts to any door frame from 60 to 100 cm without drilling. Screw tension system with vulcanized rubber anti-slip plates that protect the door finish.
2.detail: Kit included: 4 M10 bolts · Level · Illustrated guide

3.label: 03 — Grip System
3.title:
The grip you
were after.
3.text: Dual-diamond knurling in the central area for maximum traction even with sweaty hands. Anodized aluminium ends slide smoothly during kipping and advanced dynamic movements.
3.detail: Knurling zone 28 cm · Smooth ends 12 cm per side

4.label: 04 — Versatility
4.title:
Over 40 exercises
possible.
4.text: Pull-up, chin-up, muscle-up, L-sit, skin the cat: one bar for your whole workout. Compatible with assistance bands, parallettes and rings thanks to integrated stainless steel hooks.
4.detail: Grip width: standard 81 cm · wide 91 cm

5.label: 05 — Certifications
5.title:
CE certified.
5 year warranty.
5.text: Entirely European production with quality checks on every single piece. Tested according to EN 957 for domestic fitness equipment. Tracked shipping in 24/48h with reinforced packaging included in Italy.

6.label: 06 — Aesthetics
6.title:
Design you
see and feel.
6.text: Matte black finish with yellow Static details. The bar is not just equipment, it's a design object that enhances your space. Also available in all-black for a total dark look.
6.detail: Colors: Matte Black / All Black · Premium recyclable packaging

shop.subtitle: Three sizes, one quality. Each Static parallette is built to last a lifetime.

parallette-s.description: Compact version for small spaces. Height 15 cm, width 30 cm. Ideal for L-sit, planche progressions and floor dips. Steel frame with non-slip feet.

parallette-m.description: Intermediate size, highly versatile. Height 15 cm, width 40 cm. Perfect for handstand push-ups, pike push-ups and pseudo planche. Anodized aluminium handles for secure grip.

parallette-l.description: Professional version for heavy use. Height 15 cm, width 50 cm. Suited for deep dips, transitions and explosive movements. Full-steel construction with included hardware.
